Westminster Governments, Prime Minsters, and Secretaries of State, 1968-present

The following table lists the Westminster (British) governments, the names of the Prime Ministers (PM), Home Secretaries (HS) and the names of the Secretaries of State (SoS) for Northern Ireland, from 1968 to the present. Click on each name for a biography of the selected person.

Party Which Formed Government at Westminster

(Northern Ireland)

or Home Secretary (HS)

(Dates of Appointment)

Note: In a number of cases there is an overlap where a Secretary of State remains in post following the return of the same government at a general election.
